perturbation.original_text: MediaLinx shall retain all right, title to and interest in the discussion forums;
perturbation.changed_text: MediaLinx may or may not retain all right, title to and interest in the discussion forums as per the agreed decision between both parties;
perturbation.explanation: By replacing 'shall' with 'may or may not' and introducing a decision-making process, the original definitive statement regarding ownership is contradicted.

perturbation.original_text: HCI shall be the exclusive health content partner in the health section of the Sympatico web site
perturbation.changed_text: HCI may be considered a preferred health content provider for the health section of the Sympatico web site, but exclusive rights are subject to periodic review.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly stated 'exclusive health content partner'. The modified text introduces 'preferred health content provider' and conditions 'subject to periodic review,' which undermines the guarantee of exclusivity, creating a contradiction.

perturbation.original_text: Each Party shall keep confidential any information, data and reports obtained in connection with this Agreement, unless such information has been rightfully obtained from a third party or is generally available to the public, or as must be disclosed by law.
perturbation.changed_text: Each Party will endeavor to maintain the confidentiality of information, data, and reports; however, complete confidentiality is not guaranteed and may be subject to internal disclosure policies.
perturbation.explanation: The original text imposes a strict obligation ('shall keep confidential'). The modified text weakens this obligation by using 'will endeavor to maintain' and introduces 'internal disclosure policies', potentially allowing for disclosures not covered by the original exceptions, which makes it contradictory.
